label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_010
content:

### Infrastructure

- idp-api-02: CPU 44% | Mem 66% | Disk 61% | Conns: 296 | Net: 79/84 Mbps
- audit-worker-01: CPU 56% | Mem 56% | Disk 46% | Conns: N/A | Net: 114/109 Mbps
- audit-db-01: CPU 33% | Mem 75% | Disk 75% | IOPS: 8600 | Replication lag: 0.5 sec

### Connection Pools
- auth_pool: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 2 | max 200 | avg_wait 15ms
- session_pool: active 85 | idle 20 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max 150 | avg_wait 10ms
- token_pool: active 200 | idle 50 | waiting 8 | exhaustion 4 | max 300 | avg_wait 20ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1,250,000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] idp-api-01 CPU at 46%
- [WARNING] audit-worker-01 CPU at 56%
- [INFO] audit-db-01 disk usage at 75%
- [ERROR] idp-api-02 network in at 79 Mbps
- [ERROR] idp-api-02 network out at 84 Mbps

### Deployments & Changes
- Deployed new MFA enrollment UI update.
- Applied security patch to idp-api-01 and idp-api-02.
- Updated RBAC policies for admin role.
- Restarted audit-worker-01 for performance tuning.
- Scheduled directory sync for midnight.

### Events
- Completed internal audit checklist for token signing key custody: validated HSM access logs and operator approvals.
- Resolved 6 helpdesk tickets for MFA resets after phone replacements; verified identity proofing steps logged.
- Reviewed anomalous device blocks; 3 tied to new corporate laptop image missing device cert; coordinated with IT.
- Ran monthly sample of admin sessions to confirm session recording enabled; documented evidence IDs.

### On-Call
- Shift: E. Garcia. 0 pages. 7 tickets. Status: Stable; compliance sampling and device cert coordination in progress.
